NeedMaterial.Name: Season Pass EXP
NeedMaterial.Description:
Earned by completing activity goals. When Season Pass EXP reaches a certain level, the Season Pass level can be increased.
Increasing the Season Pass level allows you to claim generous rewards.

Earned by completing activity goals. When Season Pass EXP reaches a certain level, the Season Pass level can be increased.

NeedMaterial.Name: Engram Dust Crystals
NeedMaterial.Description:
An exceptionally rare collected resource.
The higher level of the gatherable, the greater the chance of obtaining it. It is subject to a weekly acquisition limit.

An exceptionally rare collected resource.
The higher level of the gatherable, the greater the chance of obtaining it. It is subject to a weekly acquisition limit.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A rare crystal shimmering with starlight.

NeedMaterial.Name: Alloy Shard
NeedMaterial.Description: After collecting enough alloy shards, you can go to the Artisan Guild and exchange them for level 40 purple quality gear at the gear forging Artisan Harvey.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: After collecting enough alloy shards, you can go to the Artisan Guild and exchange them for level 40 purple quality gear at the gear forging Artisan Harvey.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: This alloy is smelted from materials from powerful monsters and rare minerals, capable of reacting to Engram and emitting a flickering glow. Due to its unique research value, it is highly favored by experts on the Bapharian Legacy.
